org.jetel.data

Class DataRecordFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jetel.data.DataRecordFactory

  • public final class DataRecordFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for factorisation of DataRecord object. Constructors of DataRecord are deprecated.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DataRecordFactory()

      • DataRecordFactory

    • Method Detail

      • newRecord

        public static DataRecord newRecord(DataRecordMetadata metadata)
        Creates new instance of DataRecord based on specified metadata ( how many fields, what field types, etc.)
        Parameters:
        _metadata - description of the record structure

      • newToken

        public static Token newToken(DataRecordMetadata metadata)
        Creates new instance of Token based on specified metadata.

      • newToken

        public static Token newToken(java.lang.String name)
        Creates dummy token without fields. Can be used for token tracking purpose. Sometimes can be requested to log a token message and no token is available at the time. So this token can be used, initialised an unify later with a real token.
        Parameters:
        name - name of artificial empty metadata which will be used for resulted token
        Returns:
        empty token

      • newRecordCloverBuffer

        public static CloverBuffer newRecordCloverBuffer()
        Returns:
        direct CloverBuffer suitable to handle a serialised data record

      • newRecordWithInvalidState

        public static DataRecordWithInvalidState newRecordWithInvalidState(DataRecordMetadata metadata)
        Returns:
        data record with data fields, which are able to mark the as invalid
        See Also:
        DataFieldWithInvalidState, DataRecordWithInvalidState
